title: 1.7.9正版标题闪退？
author: 吮吸的神奇羽毛
txt_content:
显卡更新试过
java全拆掉重新安装试过
1.5.2可以运行 
1.7.9就不可以
正版启动器
主要错误信息如下：
22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000000b9b55ec, pid=5020, tid=4356
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (7.0_60-b19) (build 1.7.0_60-b19)
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (24.60-b09 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # Problematic frame:
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # C  [ig4dev64.dll+0x55ec]
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # An error report file with more information is saved as:
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\hs_err_pid5020.log
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #   http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> # See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
[22:25:55 INFO]: Client> #

replies.txt_content:
正版启动器启动的怎么会闪退啊......
是什么运行环境啊?
